title: Need to bring startups to boost green hydrogen: Pralhad Joshi
description: New and Renewable Energy Minister Pralhad Joshi emphasized the importance of involving startups in the green hydrogen sector to foster innovation and engage youth. Speaking at a curtain raiser for the 2nd International Conference on Green Hydrogen India 2024, he highlighted that over 120 exhibitors and 150-plus speakers will participate in the event scheduled for September 11-13, 2024 in Delhi.
